presentation: My name is Luciano, a 22-year-old full-stack developer from Godoy Cruz, Mendoza. With over three years of experience in web development, my journey has included courses, specialized training, engineering studies, participation in incubators, and freelance projects. Currently, I am pursuing a degree in Systems Engineering at the National Technological University.
title: Software developer

fullstack-java-course.title: Java Full Stack Developer Course
fullstack-java-course.description: I started my programming journey with an intensive Java Full Stack Developer course, where I completed over 500 hours in 6 months. I learned Spring Boot, MySQL, Bootstrap, HTML, and CSS, developing full applications from backend to frontend.

javascript-course.title: JavaScript Course
javascript-course.description: In this course, I gained solid knowledge of JavaScript, starting from the basics to advanced concepts such as asynchronous API requests and callback handling. For the final project, I developed a web application integrating local storage.

ing-civil.title: Civil Engineering
ing-civil.description: I attended a technical high school, graduating as a Building Construction Technician. Following this path, I decided to study Civil Engineering, successfully completing my first year. However, I realized my true passion was in a different field.

ing-sistemas.title: Systems Engineering
ing-sistemas.description: I discovered my passion for programming and systems, which led me to switch to Systems Engineering. I am currently in my third year, having passed some courses from the fourth year.

bootcamp.title: Full Stack Development Bootcamp
bootcamp.description: I participated in a bootcamp where we developed a complete application as a team using ReactJS, Java with Spring Boot, and MySQL as the database. Over three months, we worked following the Scrum methodology, improving both technical and teamwork skills.

freelance.title: Freelance Development
freelance.description: I currently work as a freelance developer, carrying out various projects ranging from landing pages to specific business applications.

ubuntu.title: Ubuntu
ubuntu.description: I contributed to the development of Ubuntu as part of the Frontend team. Ubuntu is a platform designed to connect investors with sustainable ventures, promoting positive environmental impact and sustainable growth. I worked with ReactJS for the frontend, Java for the backend, and implemented libraries like Cloudinary for image management.

futbol.title: Freelance Work
futbol.description: I am currently working as a Frontend developer on a web application for managing, planning, and training football teams. The project uses technologies such as PHP, JavaScript, TailwindCSS, and JQuery.

fitbyte.title: Fitbyte+
fitbyte.description: Fitbyte is a personal project aimed at tracking gym routines, statistics, timings, and workouts. I use ReactJS with TailwindCSS for the frontend, Cloudinary for image management, and NodeJS with MySQL for the backend.
